testcase.classname: Amazon adding products to cart Test
testcase.name: validate products added to cart

failure.message: The scenario has pending or undefined step(s)

testcase.failure: Given user is on Amazon homePage............................................undefined When user searches for Teddy bear...........................................undefined And user sorts the products according to customer review....................undefined And user selects Age range between 5 to 7 years old.........................undefined And user adds first two products into his cart..............................undefined Then two selected teddy bears should be available in his cart...............undefined
